justification: The proposal centers on Team A’s upgrade and ignores Team B’s preferences for healthy, consistent players and favorable schedules. B’s Josh Robinson has a friendly playoff schedule and workhorse role, aligning with B’s values; A offers an injured RB (Alex King), a volatile committee RB (Caleb Turner) with tough playoffs, and a deep-threat WR (Cameron Holt) with tough playoffs—poor fit for B. Rationale is brief and A-centric despite a modest p_accept. Trade is feasible but poorly tailored to B.
